item.title: Apache Hop 2.7 is available!!
item.description: The Apache Hop PMC is proud to announce the release of version 2.7.0, this release contains 51 tickets and some work that has not been covered by tickets. A huge thank you to everyone who made this possible. Â Let's take a closer look at what Hop 2.7 brings: Redshift Bulk loader JDBC Driver refactoring Improvements Enhanced JSON Ouput Formula Transform Underline transform names Improved Brazilian Community GitHub Issues or download Hop 2.
